plays.text: Goal scored by Marco Sturm assisted by Patrick Marleau and Todd Harvey
Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for Hooking Eric Messier
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Martin Skoula and Peter Forsberg
Goal scored by Derek Morris assisted by Milan Hejduk and Peter Forsberg
Penalty to Mike Keane 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Lynn Loyns
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Roughing Mark Smith served by Dan Hinote
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Roughing Mark Smith
Penalty to Mark Smith 2 minutes for Roughing Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Mike Rathje 2 minutes for Holding Bates Battaglia
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Interference Teemu Selanne
Goal scored by Milan Hejduk assisted by Peter Forsberg
